==Chinese==

===Etymology===
From {{der|zh|yue|-}} {{zh-l|搞掂|gaau2 dim6}}. Mandarin lacks the ''-m'' final in Cantonese (as in {{zh-l|掂}}), and renders it as ''-ŋ'': {{zh-l|定|to determine, to settle}} instead.
